headline: FORD BOSS LISA BRANKIN 🚗⚡ SLAMMING EV TAXES 💸🚫 – 'NOT NOW QUEEN, DEMAND'S STALLED 😩📉, DON'T PUT THE BRAKES ON GREEN DREAMS 🛑🍆!'
text:
YO FORD UK MOMMY LISA BRANKIN 👩‍💼🔥 dropping TRUTH BOMBS 💣📢 on BBC: 'It's CERTAINLY NOT the right TIME ⏰🚫 to TAX those THICC ELECTRIC BABES ⚡🚗 when DEMAND's LOST MOMENTUM 😰📉💨!' Chancellor RACHEL REEVES 💅🇬🇧 eyeing new LEVIES on EVs in the Budget? Lisa's like 'HELL NAH 🤬🚫, that's just ANOTHER BRAKE 🛑🍑 on fragile sales!' PAY-PER-MILE from 2028? ADMIN NIGHTMARE 📱💻 turning potential EV simps OFF the switch 😤🔌 – 'Easy to sell what peeps WANT 😍, HARD AF to PUSH what they DON'T 👎😩!' EVs went from HYPE BEASTS 🐐⚡ to 'TRYING TO FORCE-FEED' 😖🍲 – market DISTORTED with HEAVY DISCOUNTS 🤑📉 and SHITTY RESALE VALUES 💸🗑️!

FORD PUMA 🐆🚗 UK's TOP DOG 🐕👑, TRANSIT VAN 🛻 #2 SLAYER 🔪, but FOCUS 🚙 got AXED 🪓😢 – last one rolled off in GERMANY 🇩🇪 LAST WEEK 🗓️💥! 6K JOBS in UK 🇬🇧, DAGENHAM ENGINE PLANT 🏭💨 and HALEWOOD TRANS 🧩 – no CARS built here since 2013 📅😭. NET ZERO PUSH 🟢🌍 demanding 80% EV SALES by 2030 or FINES 🚨💰 – FORD CAN'T HIT THAT WITHOUT GOV GRANTS 🤑🎁 up to £3,750! Lisa spilling: 'WE NEED THAT HELP 👋 or we're SCREWED 🔩😩!' SMMT STATS 📊🔥: EVs at 22.4% new sales thru Oct '25 (up from 18.1% last yr 📈👍), SEPTEMBER HIT RECORD HIGH 🚀⚡ since 2020 – but Lisa calls BS: 'BUOYANT HYPE deflated 😞🫧, customer demand NOT matching AMBITION!'

BUSINESS FLEETS 🚌💼 gobbling EVs for LOW COMPANY CAR TAX 🤑📉 vs petrol/diesel DINOSAURS 🦕⛽ – Lisa BEGGING chancellor: 'KEEP THAT GREEN TAX PERK 💚💸 for fleet greening!' DAGENHAM DIESEL PLANT 🏭🛢️ (EUROPE'S BIGGEST BACK IN DAY 👑) employs 1,800 peeps ⚒️ – building till 2030 but FUTURE? 'WORKING HARD on NEXT LIFE 🔮🚀, NOTHING SETTLED YET 🤷‍♀️💭!' Meanwhile, TREASURY SIMPS 🤡💼: 'Fuel duty for GAS GULPERS ⛽🚗, NO EQUIV for EVs ⚡ – we want FAIR PLAY ⚖️ for ALL DRIVERS!' But Ford's like 'NOT THE VIBE RN 😎🚫, let's PUMP THE BRAKES on taxes and REVIVE that EV ORGY 💦⚡!' Wall Street? NAH, this is UK ROAD RAGE vs GREEN HYPE – Lisa Brankin HOLDING THE LINE like a boss babe 🛡️👸! Sign up for FUTURE EARTH TEA ☕🌍 cuz climate drama's just GETTING STARTED 🔥📰!
